title: Block Type Font? Used as branding though the Arsenal Stock site.
content:
Well, Ive been working as a photographer for the past few years, and out of the graphic design biz, so Im a bit rusty still.  
Who knows the font of the HOODIE DESIGN text? Im sure its an easy one.

Always, cheers in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110623043552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hoodiebanner_5373.jpg)
author: robertcooper

comments.content: I think someone took [Gotham Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20110623043552/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100008) and put a stroke around it in e.g. Illustrator.

Luzaine-Ultra Bold  
this site is a great tool for font recognition:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110623043552/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/")

coflair7213, font recognition tools are ok, but you have to check the results.  
That’ll require the use of your eyes.

The smaller text seems to be Gotham, too, so I think Bart is right.
… and finally Gotham isn't in the MyFonts-database …
